Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The rim of the mug has been incised with a twisted rope design, and the outside is embossed with a grinning skull and crossbones design. $(this.trait:level-desc)

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "The zingy dryness of this alcohol slides smoothly down the back of your throat, leaving behind a faint taste that can only be described as a combination of cinnamon, nutmeg, and rum. After a few moments the actual kick of the liquor hits you"
